justification: "The participants then used a slider scale to indicate how much they were willing to pay to improve the inferior outcome so that they would receive $2 instead of $0 (i.e., a hedge)."

"All participants were endowed with $1 and they were told that this money was theirs to keep but that they could use some of this money to potentially increase their winnings from the wheel. The BDM method was then explained to them… the participants could bid on increasing the losing outcome… or bid on increasing the winning outcome."
